description:
Katsuhira finds out what happened to the friends from his childhood and Sonozaki is intent on making the Kizna Experiment successful no matter what.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichiichi Renraku Shiatte Kimochi o Kakunin Shiawanaito. Datte, Tomodachi Nanda kara!
Il faut s`appeler régulièrement pour s`assurer de nos sentiments ! On est amis !
We Have to Contact Each Other and Confirm Our Feelings. Because We`re Friends!
いちいち連絡しあって気持ちを確認しあわないと. だって, 友達なんだから!
